_source.text: After bargaining, their take could drop to $1. "Our life is hard here, but it's better than in Hunan," says Ma, explaining that his extended family, unable to make ends meet on the limited land assigned to them, had urged him to go to the city.

text: After bargaining, their take could drop to $1. "Our life is hard here, but it's **better** **than** in Hunan," says Ma, explaining that his extended **family**, unable to make **ends** meet on the limited land assigned to them, had urged him to go to **the** **city**.
